articles.description: Netflix has picked up “Source Code” co-writer Ben Ripley’s sci-fi spec script “Parallel” which is being produced by Dan Lin and Jonathan Eirich’s Rideback (“The Two Popes”). The sci-fi heist story involves a man and woman who traffic in high-end crimes in par…
